cms.query.QueryText: UPDATE Forums_ForumPost SET PostQuestionSolved = CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Forums_ForumPost p WHERE (p.PostForumID = @ForumID) AND (p.PostIDPath LIKE Forums_ForumPost.PostIDPath + '%') AND @Limit <= (ISNULL(p.PostIsAnswer, 0) - ISNULL(p.PostIsNotAnswer, 0))) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE (Forums_ForumPost.PostForumID = @ForumID) AND (Forums_ForumPost.PostLevel = 0) AND (@PostIDPath = '' OR Forums_ForumPost.PostIDPath = @PostIDPath)
